name: Would you like to exist? (Ludum Dare Jam 45)
name_original: Would you like to exist? (Ludum Dare Jam 45)
description:
Ludum Dare 45 "Start with nothing"

NOW IN HTML5!!

Controls are mouse only, in fact, the whole game can be played simply by moving the mouse (no clicking necessary)

Couple of hints: 

  • Google "DNA Pairing" if you are not sure what's going on, it will help you understand how the game is played!
  • The white grabber is what makes the circle fill up

Enjoy!
